creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas
description: beaded collar with blue and black beads; central cloth covered vertical element, stiffened with metal; leather ties at front; back curved metal element, covered with thread, with white and yellow bead strands between metal pieces; crescent-shaped bone pendant at back bottom, embellished with circular carved designs and aluminum and copper metal rings
medium: Beads, cotton, leather, iron, cow bone, aluminum, copper
title: Woman's neckpiece
